summary: The tragic death of a beautiful young girl starts a tense and atmospheric game of cat and mouse between hunter John Moon and the hardened backwater criminals out for his blood.
cast: Sam Rockwell|William H. Macy|Ted Levine|Kelly Reilly|Jason Isaacs|Joe Anderson|Jeffrey Wright|Ophelia Lovibond|Amy Sloan|W. Earl Brown|Heather Lind|Christie Burke|Jenica Bergere|Lana Giacose|David A. Flannery|Duffy|Michael Eisner|A.C. Peterson
